attributes.action: tommy Robison to cover important justice cases without fear of arrest or prison
attributes.additional_details: The public who sign this petition are in full support of tommy Robinson we believe that these cases are in the public interest.
attributes.background: 10k Facebook viewers whitness a unlawful arrest of tommy Robinson. Tommy was showing the public a justice case. As he  was by no way breaking any laws! We the public believe that these cases are indeed in the public interest!

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could do. Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking for a specific change in the contempt of court laws, if that’s what you’d like to happen.
